synopsis.text: Rin Matsuoka reunites with his childhood friend Sousuke Yamazaki, who has transferred to Samezuka Academy. Together with Rin, Sousuke, energetic Momotarou Mikoshiba, and hardworking Aiichirou Nitori, the Samezuka swim team is formed. Their friendship deepens as they train together for tournaments and races. However, Sousuke’s sudden return to competitive swimming begins to trouble him physically, affecting his performance. Noticing changes in his friend, Rin tries to uncover the issues holding Sousuke back. Their bond is tested as Sousuke deals with new challenges. Ultimately, with the support of friends by their side, Rin and Sousuke aim to fulfill a childhood dream of swimming together at the highest levels, overcoming any obstacles in the way. Their stories highlight themes of friendship, determination and facing one’s demons.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
